MCQ: Which machine learning algorithm is primarily used for dimensionality reduction?
Choices: a: K-Nearest Neighbors | b: Principal Component Analysis | c: Support Vector Machines | d: Logistic Regression

MCQ: In supervised learning, what is the role of labeled data?
Choices: a: To evaluate the model's performance on unseen data | b: To train the model to predict outcomes for new, unlabeled data | c: To cluster data points based on similarity | d: To reduce the dimensionality of the data

MCQ: What type of neural network is particularly well-suited for processing sequential data, such as text or time series?
Choices: a: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) | b: Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) | c: Radial Basis Function Network (RBFN) | d: Self-Organizing Map (SOM)

MCQ: Which evaluation metric is commonly used to assess the performance of a classification model by considering the trade-off between true positive rate and false positive rate?
Choices: a: Precision | b: Recall | c: F1-score | d: AUC-ROC

MCQ: What phenomenon occurs when a machine learning model performs extremely well on the training data but poorly on unseen data?
Choices: a: Underfitting | b: Overfitting | c: Convergence | d: Regularization
